tool_description: Integrate WhatsApp without limits to your own services or apps! Groups & Buttons, Technical support & Guides. API works stably and does not crash during updates
name: WhatsApp API for developers / Free plan
title: WhatsApp API for developers / Free plan
tool_name: WhatsApp API for developers / Free plan

api_list.name: archiveChat

required_parameters.name: ChatID
required_parameters.description: Chat ID

api_list.name: createGroup
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-api-for-developers-free-plan.p.rapidapi.com/groups"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-api-for-developers-free-plan.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: sendMediaMessage
api_list.description:
Additional endpoint for easy send media-file as message.
Use request body as file and inpath parameters for send parameters.
Media message can be one of the following types:
- 📷 image
- 🎥 video
- 🎬 gif
- 🎵 audio
- 🎤 voice
- 📄 document
- 🎭 sticker

required_parameters.name: MediaMessageType
required_parameters.description: Media message type

required_parameters.name: SendParams
required_parameters.description: Send sender parameters via query

optional_parameters.description: Message ID of the message to be quoted

optional_parameters.name: typing_time
optional_parameters.description: Time in seconds to simulate typing

optional_parameters.name: link_preview
optional_parameters.description: If 'body' contains a link, this parameter can be used to create custom preview link

api_list.name: checkPhones
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://whatsapp-api-for-developers-free-plan.p.rapidapi.com/contacts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "whatsapp-api-for-developers-free-plan.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
